MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float32[] ToXyz(float32[] v) cil managed

Docs.param: An array of color components containing the color space's color value to convert to XYZ, and large enough to hold the resulting tristimulus XYZ values
Docs.summary: Converts a color value from this color space's model to tristimulus CIE XYZ values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual float[] ToXyz (float r, float g, float b);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float32[] ToXyz(float32 r, float32 g, float32 b) cil managed
abstract member ToXyz : single * single * single -> single[] override this.ToXyz : single * single * single -> single[]

Docs.param: The first component of the value to convert from (typically R in RGB)
The second component of the value to convert from (typically G in RGB)
The third component of the value to convert from (typically B in RGB)
Docs.summary: Converts a color value from this color space's model to tristimulus CIE XYZ values.
Docs.returns: A new array of 3 floats, containing tristimulus XYZ values
